Subject: Unusual sighting in the break room
Paragraphs:
Hi team,

I just wanted to give everyone a heads up about an unusual sighting I had in the break room this morning. I'm not sure if it was a rat or a large mouse, but it was definitely not a common sight around here. I've already let the facilities team know, but please be careful when using the break room until they can investigate and address the situation.

Thanks,
Lisa
